scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application.'
scripts.setup-production: npm install && npm run build && echo 'Production build complete! Run npm start to launch.'
scripts.check-system: node --version && npm --version && echo 'System requirements check complete.'
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .next && npm install && echo 'System reset complete.'
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: setup, dev, build, start, lint, setup-production, check-system, reset'
